one.description: If {token} ends in 1, but not in 11

other.description: {token} ends in 0 or {token} ends in 5..9 or {token} ends in 11..14

vowel.examples: а, и, о, у, ы, э

rules.description: in all other cases, append x times

times.description: The iteration form of the cardinal numbers

ordinal.description: The adjective form of the cardinal numbers

rules.description: append 'st' if value ends in 1, but not in 11
append 'nd' if value ends in 2, but not in 12
append 'nd' if value ends in 3, but not in 13

ord.description: The adjective form of the cardinal numbers
